lw3dge.graphics.entities

Class GraphicalEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • lw3dge.graphics.entities.GraphicalEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameEntity

    public class GraphicalEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updatable
    This class is the most basic Entity class. It represents an in-game object as a TexturedModel, Transform, and Scale.
    Author:
    Jared Massa
    See Also:
    Transform, TexturedModel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static lw3dge.components.math.Vector3f NORMAL_SCALE
      A scale with no variation in any axis
      Transform transform
      The instructions on where to draw this object stored in a Transform

        model - the TexturedModel to represent this basic entity

        scale - the scale of this specific entity (graphical scale)
